body_html:
I am getting another error after I use the workaround,
2018-06-28 16:17:56.152587: I tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/convert/convert_nodes.cc:2660] Max batch size= 1 max workspace size= 151830 2018-06-28 16:17:56.152618: I tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/convert/convert_nodes.cc:2666] starting build engine *** Error in python: munmap_chunk(): invalid pointer: 0x00007ffc3d3f1940 ***
I saw a similar issue, which was resolved, ##19142 , but I am using 3.0.4 and not running out of GPU memory

body:
I am getting another error after I use the workaround, 
`2018-06-28 16:17:56.152587: I tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/convert/convert_nodes.cc:2660] Max batch size= 1 max workspace size= 151830
2018-06-28 16:17:56.152618: I tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/convert/convert_nodes.cc:2666] starting build engine
*** Error in python: munmap_chunk(): invalid pointer: 0x00007ffc3d3f1940 ***
`
I saw a similar issue, which was resolved, #https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/19142 , but I am using 3.0.4 and not running out of GPU memory
